page.title: 11A day with Daniel Clifton
page.content: Daniel Clifton is a pupil at Rothersthorpe C.E. Primary School. His day starts at 7.30am when he gets up and has a shower. After breakfast he leaves for school at 8.30am. He arrives at school at about 8.40am but does not go into school until 9am. His first break is at 10.30am until 11am. His second break is lunchtime, 12 o'clock . Daniel goesn home for lunch and returns to school at 12.45pm. Afternoon school commences at 1.15-pm. He has his last break at 2.30pm. He goes home at 3.45pm. At home he gets a change of clothing and then he goes out to play. Daniel has his tea at 5pm, and then he goes back out to play until 8pm. When he comes in he watches television until 10pm, then he goes to bed.
